reviewText: My kids watched these when they were young - a friend had a baby and I thought what better gift than these. They are also hard to find and all others were very expensive - so this was a great find.

I watched this series in the Philippines growing up, after school. And for a long time I thought I imagined this series and the Superbook series. I wish it were on DVD, the reason why I know any bible stories are because of these cartoons!
These are no longer in print but they are facinating bible stories and classics. I also love the superbook series but you CAN find those at christianbook dot com. I grabbed it as soon as I saw it.
This is an amazing Christian cartoon video. I love this and Super Book!!!! Collectible items. I wish they'll produce it in DVDs
